Prerequisites:
PREREQUISITES: A GRADE OF C OR BETTER IN
ACG 2021 OR CONSENT OF DEPARTMENT.
Course Description:
THIS IS AN INTRODUCTORY COURSE IN MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING WHICH EMPHASIZES THE USE OF ACCOUNTING
DATA WITH RESPECT TO PLANNING OPERATIONS, CONTROLLING ACTIVITIES AND THE DECISION MAKING RESPONSIBILITIES OF MANAGERS. .
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
